channel.title: Selenium on Naresh Chaurasia
channel.description: Recent content in Selenium on Naresh Chaurasia

item.title: Java Selenium
item.description: ☕ Core Java Programming 🧪 TestNG/JUnit Framework 🗃️ SQL JDBC Programming 📦 Maven Basics 🧭 Selenium Automation with Java ☕ Git Jenkins Cucumber 🚀 Projects 🎯 Mock Interviews 🛠️ IDE Setup This Java Automation course is crafted for experienced QA professionals, test automation engineers, and SDETs who want to go deeper into the design, structure, and scalability of test automation systems. You’ll gain deep expertise in Core Java, Selenium WebDriver, REST Assured, and JUnit, with a strong focus on building robust, reusable, and maintainable automation frameworks for UI and API testing.
